casebody.data:
[Cite as 12113/2002 Case Announcements #2, 2002-Ohio-6848.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 13, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-2001. State v. McCullough.

Fayette App. No. CA2001-10-015, 2002-Ohio-5453. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of court of appeals’ judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of court of appeals’ judgment be, and hereby is, granted.

F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., dissent.
